meanings.definition: A tumor arising in the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the lymphomata in her body needed to be treated.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating lymphomata cases.
meanings.sent3: The lymphomata decided to throw a party in her lymphatic system.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphatic system was a garden where lymphomata grew like wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lymphomata spreading in her body haunted her dreams.

meanings.sent1: The research team studied various lymphomata to understand the disease better.
meanings.sent2: The conference focused on the different types of lymphomata affecting patients.
meanings.sent3: The lymphomata gathered for a group photo, each with its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent4: In the field of oncology, lymphomata are like puzzle pieces waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The textbook illustrated the diversity of lymphomata with colorful diagrams.
